Package com.github.stevenscript.product

Class productDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.github.stevenscript.product.productDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
productDAO
public class productDAOImpl extends Object implements productDAO
JDBC implementation of the ProductDAO interface.

Uses DatabaseConnection to interact with the PostgreSQL database.

    • findByName

      public List<product> findByName(String namePattern)
      Retrieves a list of products from the database whose names match the given pattern. Uses a case-insensitive search ('ILIKE') to match the pattern anywhere in the product name.
      Specified by:
      findByName in interface productDAO
      Parameters:
      namePattern - the substring or pattern used for matching product names. It will be wrapped with '%' wildcards for partial matches.
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects matching the pattern, or an empty list if no matches are found.

    • update

      Updates an existing product in the database.
      Specified by:
      update in interface productDAO
      Parameters:
      product - The product to update.
      Returns:
      True if the product was updated successfully, false otherwise.

      Deletes a product by its ID.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface productDAO

      Returns:
